name: MoPub-FacebookAudienceNetwork-Adapters
summary: Facebook Adapters for mediating through MoPub.
description:
Supported ad formats: Banners, Interstitial, Rewarded Video and Native.

To download and integrate the Facebook SDK, please check https://developers.facebook.com/docs/audience-network/ios/#sdk. 


For inquiries and support, please visit https://developers.facebook.com/products/audience-network/faq/.
